Title: An Act Renaming Barangay Gintong Silahis of Quezon City to Barangay N. S. Amoranto
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 688
An Act Renaming Barangay Gintong Silahis of Quezon City to Barangay N. S. Amoranto
Section 1. In due recognition to the outstanding contributions of the late Quezon City Mayor Norberto S. Amoranto in the improvement of barangays and the development of Quezon City into a modern metropolis, Barangay Gintong Silahis in the first district of Quezon City is hereby renamed Barangay N. S. Amoranto.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: March 7, 1984
